title: Towards Accessible Physical AI: LoRA-Based Fine-Tuning of VLA Models for Real-World Robot Control
summary: Vision-Language-Action (VLA) models have demonstrated remarkable capabilities in robotic manipulation,enabling robots to execute natural language commands through end-to-end learning from visual observations.However, deploying large-scale VLA models on affordable robotic platforms remains challenging due to computational constraints and the need for efficient adaptation to new robot embodiments.
